title: Monitor Ad Campaign Performance
description: A week after an ad campaign launch, an advertiser wants a performance report.

tasks.description: Identify the specific ad campaign in the ad management system.
Retrieve the key performance metrics for the campaign (impressions, click-through rate, video completion rate).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls a report with all the required metrics.

tasks.description: Format the metrics into a clear, concise report and send it to the advertiser.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and sends a well-formatted report.
